column1: Kata Robata////My boyfriend and I love coming on dates here. I work close to Kata and he likes to meet me there for our favorite
column2: Lychee Martinis (w/Vodka not Gin). Their sushi is both fresh and delicious. The chef often has new and great things on the menu
column3: so it's never the same stuff over and over
column4: even though we only order the same things :)
